Text: could not load a library client , any fix?

copy and paste in a .txt file, then change the type of file to .reg file:

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftwareValveSteam]
"Language"="english"

save it, double click on it and press ok

working or not? this is important

sorry they (website) removed decimal point so go to:

HKEY_CURRENT_USER - Software - Valve - Steam - Language - double click on it and write "english" and press ok

after you got this game, u must have Client.dll that originally created on your PC, because that Client.dll contain some hardware ID or something else that don't work on other computer, now if you have some family member or internet friend that bought this game legal, ask them to help to create special Client.dll using your PC, that the only way now..maybe someday CEG crack will come and not require you to create Client.dll using another legit account..
